Lakme Teknia Deep Care Shampoo - Imported (300 ml) Price: Rs.2400

Lakme Teknia Deep Care Shampoo 10.2 Oz.Lakme Teknia DEEP CARE Shampoo
column14: Restoring Shampoo for Dry or Damaged Hair. Benefits : Cleanses gently reconstructing and repairing hair from the inside. Restores structural substances in hair fibres that have suffered external damage by providing ceramides II. Restores the hairs natural properties. Result: Strong healthy shiny hair. Contains : WAA is a complex of plant amino acids that cares for hair by acting in-depth from the inside out. Directions:Spread on wet scalp and hair. Shampoo gently. Rinse thoroughly with plenty of water.Dry or damaged hairHair that has been chemically treated (dyeing bleaching perming) suffers a series of internal structure alterations that cause it to lose some of its natural properties.It becomes more fragile dehydrated dull difficult to comb highly porous as well as losing its capacity for self-protection against possible future damage.The deep care product line aims to restructure damaged fibers with a repairing treatment that penetrates into the deepest areas of hair. The most effective way of doing this is to apply the same structural hair fiber substances that have suffered damage during aggressive chemical applications. It incorporates high concentrations of WAA 1.500 ppm essential components found in keratin and ceramides. Hair is restructured in depth increasing its elasticity mechanical strength and resistance. Its formula repairs those areas that have suffered greatest damage cuticle scales bind and hair recovers its natural vigour and shine. Active agents:- Abyssinian oil (rich in Omega 3 and 6 fatty acids): Provides in depth moisturizing without oiliness. Hair recovers its natural properties: strength softness and shine. Improves combing. - Ceramides: Restore and repair hair fiber by adhering to the cellular cement of keratin. Hair restored from roots to ends.Application:Apply to wet hair.Lather.Rinse.
